Web Developer (LAMP)

Scope of Position:

We are looking for an experienced web developer to join our fast-paced development team.​ The
ideal developer will be an innovative leader who is fluent in software
development, mainly focused on website development and Internet application
programming using PHP, JavaScript, AJAX and CSS on the LAMP (Linux /​ Apache /​
MySQL /​ PHP) platform.​

Technical Skills required

• experience in PHP and MySQL development

• Experience in web technologies such as CSS, JavaScript, J2EE/J2ME, Apache, AJAX.​

• Solid LAMP stack knowledge (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP)

• Experience in cross browser development.​

• experience in mobile environment development (Android, iPhone, Blackberry)



Other Requirements

• Experience with API-based web services is a plus.​

• Experience with cloud web services is a plus.​

• Experience with Subversion is a plus.​

• Understanding and experience in Web development,programming/​scripting languages and database systems (LAMP, JQuery, etc.​)

• Fluency in best practices for web-based information architecture and design,as well as strong knowledge of usability principles and techniques.​

• Work on development of back-end databases for high volume web applications

• Experience with Linux and the command line a plus

Please, note: the initial commitment required is a 4-months internship.
